hospital

Class HospitalManagementApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • hospital.HospitalManagementApplication

  • public class HospitalManagementApplication
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class. It maintains all the system.

      • isExist

        public java.lang.Object isExist(java.lang.String ssn,
                                java.lang.String type)
        Parameters:
        ssn - the ssn of the doctor/patient
        type - The type of the element of interest (doctor/patient)
        Returns:
        true if the doctor/patient exist in the system. false otherwise.

      • deleteDoctor

        public void deleteDoctor()
        This method is used to delete a doctor. It asks the user to provide the SSN number for the doctor who is needed to be deleted

      • deletePatient

        public void deletePatient()
        This method is used to delete a patient. It asks the user to enter the SSN for the patient that is to be deleted.

      • deleteNurse
